rules.natural: If the curator attends the opening, then the exhibition is successful.
Either the curator attends the opening or the donor attends the opening.
Provided that the installation is displayed in the main hall, the exhibition is successful.
Either the painting is stolen from the gallery, or if the installation is illuminated by the lighting, then it is displayed in the main hall.
Whenever the gallery is flooded by the storm, the facility is evacuated due to an emergency.
Either the gallery is flooded by the storm, or it is not the case that the exhibition is cancelled due to weather.
Under the condition that the donor approves the exhibition, it follows that the exhibition is successful.
If the sculpture is damaged during transport, then it is repaired at the gallery.
If the artist is present at the exhibition, then if the sculpture is damaged during transport, the sculpture is not repaired at the gallery.
Whenever security monitors the facility, security inspects the artwork.
Provided that the artist creates the installation, the installation is illuminated by the lighting.
If it is not the case that the donor attending the opening implies the donor approves the exhibition, then the sculpture is damaged during transport.
Should it not be true that the artist creating the installation implies the exhibition is successful, then the exhibition is cancelled due to weather.
Provided that the artist is not present at the exhibition, security monitors the facility.
Under the condition that the artist is not present at the exhibition, it does not hold that security inspects the artwork.

facts.natural: It is not the case that the painting is stolen from the gallery.
The facility is not evacuated due to an emergency.

(A1 → G).natural: If the curator attends the opening, then the exhibition is successful.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either the curator attends the opening or the donor attends the opening.

(A10 → G).natural: Provided that the installation is displayed in the main hall, the exhibition is successful.

(A11 → A10).natural: Under the condition that the installation is illuminated by the lighting, it follows that the installation is displayed in the main hall.

(A12 ∨ (A11 → A10)).natural: Either the painting is stolen from the gallery, or if the installation is illuminated by the lighting, then it is displayed in the main hall.

(A14 → A15).natural: Whenever the gallery is flooded by the storm, the facility is evacuated due to an emergency.

(A14 ∨ ¬A13).natural: Either the gallery is flooded by the storm, or it is not the case that the exhibition is cancelled due to weather.

(A2 → A3).natural: If the donor attends the opening, then the donor approves the exhibition.

(A2 → G).natural: Provided that the donor attends the opening, the exhibition is successful.

(A3 → G).natural: Under the condition that the donor approves the exhibition, it follows that the exhibition is successful.

(A4 → A5).natural: If the sculpture is damaged during transport, then it is repaired at the gallery.

(A4 → ¬A5).natural: Should the sculpture be damaged during transport, it does not hold that the sculpture is repaired at the gallery.

(A6 → (A4 → ¬A5)).natural: If the artist is present at the exhibition, then if the sculpture is damaged during transport, the sculpture is not repaired at the gallery.

(A8 → A7).natural: Whenever security monitors the facility, security inspects the artwork.

(A9 → A10).natural: If the artist creates the installation, then the installation is displayed in the main hall.

(A9 → A11).natural: Provided that the artist creates the installation, the installation is illuminated by the lighting.

(A9 → G).natural: Under the condition that the artist creates the installation, the exhibition is successful.

(¬(A2 → A3) → A4).natural: If it is not the case that the donor attending the opening implies the donor approves the exhibition, then the sculpture is damaged during transport.

(¬(A9 → G) → A13).natural: Should it not be true that the artist creating the installation implies the exhibition is successful, then the exhibition is cancelled due to weather.

(¬A6 → A7).natural: If the artist is not present at the exhibition, then security inspects the artwork.

(¬A6 → A8).natural: Provided that the artist is not present at the exhibition, security monitors the facility.

(¬A6 → ¬A7).natural: Under the condition that the artist is not present at the exhibition, it does not hold that security inspects the artwork.

A6.natural: The artist is present at the exhibition.
